Source string: We can't get past this. This is STUPID.
Translation: Тут не пройти. Це ж ТУПО.

Source string: Hmm. Looks like a test. There's probably a secret, more advanced route.
Translation: Гм-м. Схоже, він перевіряє, чи вистачить у нас розуму знайти обхідний шлях.

Source string: What's THAT supposed to mean? You think you're more advanced than me, new kid?
Translation: Це на ЩО ти натякаєш? Думаєш, що ти розумніший за мене, новачку?

Source string: Sorry. What?
I'm not stupid. You're stupid. The Coach is stupid. The whole camp is stupid. That thing flying at you is stupid!
Translation: Я не тупий. Це ти тупий. Тренер тупий. Увесь табір тупий. І те, що тебе зараз вдарить, теж тупе!

Source string: What's flying at me?
Wha--
Bobby Zilch's foot, that's what! Ya stupid new kid! Yeah!
Translation: Нога Боббі Зілча, ось що! Дубоголовий ти новачок! О, так!

Source string: Eh, eh-heh! Eh, eh, eh-eh! Eh, eh-eh!
Translation: І, і-і! І, і, і-і! І, і-і!

Source string: Waaaahhh-uh!
Uh-huh?
Oh, heh. Thanks for saving me!
Translation: О. хех. Дякую, що врятувала мене!

Source string: Well, actually, I was saving this plant.
Huh. Never seen one so meaty before.
Translation: Га. Ніколи не бачив таких м'ясистих.

Source string: I have. It's been appearing in this creepy nightmare I keep having.
Translation: А я бачила. Воно являється мені в одному й тому ж нічному жаху.

Source string: You're having nightmares? Oh, I've been reading about how to fix those! Will you let me see one?
Translation: Тебе мучать жахи? О, я читав, як їх позбавитись! Даси подивитися свій?

Source string: Hmmm. No.
Hello!
Hello?
Guess I'm early.
Hmmm...
HOLD IT RIGHT THERE, SON!
Now just what in the sam hill do you thing you're doing in there?
Translation: Now just what in the sam hill do you thing you're doing in there?

Source string: I was just looking for a way out.
Translation: I was just looking for a way out.

Source string: Oh
You found it!
Yeeeh!
Sorry about that.
Didn't think you'd get to the end so fast.
Translation: Didn't think you'd get to the end so fast.

Source string: Dang! I didn't think you'd get to the end at all!
Translation: Dang! I didn't think you'd get to the end at all!

Source string: But I'm always glad to see a soldier come back from the field alive.
Translation: But I'm always glad to see a soldier come back from the field alive.

Source string: You surprised me out there, kid.
Translation: You surprised me out there, kid.

Source string: Here. You've earned this.
Your first PSYCHONAUT MERIT BADGE!
Now if you'll excuse me, I gotta go back in.
Translation: Now if you'll excuse me, I gotta go back in.

Source string: I left some good men back there!
Translation: I left some good men back there!

Source string: Your Mental Health depends on your hustle.
Translation: Your Mental Health depends on your hustle.

Source string: If you get hurt in this plane, you will lose mental health, and not be able to maintain your projection onto the field of battle.
Translation: If you get hurt in this plane, you will lose mental health, and not be able to maintain your projection onto the field of battle.

Source string: YOU WILL BE SENT BACK TO THE REAL WORLD DO YOU UNDERSTAND?
Translation: YOU WILL BE SENT BACK TO THE REAL WORLD DO YOU UNDERSTAND?

Source string: Yes sir!
THEN LET'S HIT THIS BEACH!
LET'S TAKE THAT HILL!
Let's GO GO GO!!!
This... rocks.
Onward and upward, soldier!
Go go go!
It's game day, kid!
Move! Move! Move!
Dang, my BOWELS move more than you do, pokey!
Translation: Чорт забирай, навіть мій ШЛУНОК працює швидше за тебе!

Source string: You're like molasses goin' uphill in January--with crutches.
Translation: Повзеш як меляса вгору посеред січня. На милицях.

Source string: LESS WAITING, MORE MOTIVATING!
Translation: НЕ ЛОВИ ҐАВ, ВСТАВ І ПОГНАВ!

Source string: You'll have plenty of time to stand around when you're dead!
Translation: You'll have plenty of time to stand around when you're dead!

Source string: Is your name Joey?
No!
Cuz I'm gonna call ya "Slowey Joey."
That's not my name!
I can't hear ya! Yer talking too slow!
Ha ha ha!
You hit that ladder hard, son!
Show it who's boss!
Now that kind of wall, you can climb it up, down, sideways, whatever way you want.
Translation: По такій стіні можна повзти вгору, вниз, вбік, як завгодно.

Source string: Just get on it!
Quick! Like a monkey!
Ooo! Ooo! Ooo!
Hold it right there, boy.
That's a Mental Cobweb.
You touch one of them you're in a world of hurt.
Translation: You touch one of them you're in a world of hurt.

Source string: You can collect them with a specialized piece of equipment, once you get checked out on it.
Translation: Ти зможеш збирати її за допомогою спецобладнання, коли воно в тебе з'явиться.

Source string: Until then, just steer clear of 'em.
Relax--that's just a figment of my imagination.
Translation: Розслабся, це просто вигадка моєї уяви.

Source string: You can run right through figments.
So whenever you see a figment--suck it up, soldier!
Translation: Тож коли ти бачиш вигадку, засвой її, солдате!

Source string: Come on!
Get that figment!
Be a figgy piggy!
Who's Coach's little piggy?
Oink! Oink! Oink!
As you can see, the trapeze is very difficult.
Translation: As you can see, the trapeze is very difficult.

Source string: Most cadets can't handle it.
You might just want to stay away from it.
Translation: You might just want to stay away from it.

Source string: You'd still get a participation ribbon at the end of camp...
Translation: You'd still get a participation ribbon at the end of camp...

Source string: Hey, you got on!
Hey, where'd you learn how to do that?
Translation: Hey, where'd you learn how to do that?

Source string: Watch those mines, kid.
They'll blow you up like a ten-cent Kazoo.
Translation: They'll blow you up like a ten-cent Kazoo.

Source string: Fire, bad. I have to tell you everything, kid?
Translation: Fire, bad. I have to tell you everything, kid?

Source string: Watch it with the tight rope.
Translation: Watch it with the tight rope.

Source string: You can grab poles like that and swing on 'em.
Translation: Ти можеш хапатися за такі балки та розгойдуватися на них.

Source string: It's all about upper body strength, you know.
Translation: Секрет у тому, щоб працювати м'язами торсу.

Source string: Hrrrrrr!
Gotta keep moving, kid!
Hey, you guys... need a hand?
Translation: Hey, you guys... need a hand?

Source string: Hi.
Hi! My name's Dogen.
I know!
Really? How? Can you read minds too?
Translation: Really? How? Can you read minds too?

Source string: Well, good luck with that! Bye!
Follow me! I'll help you through the mines!
Translation: За мною! Я проведу тебе через мінне поле!

Source string: Mmm-kay.
Thanks for helping me.
Hey, you're cool!
Hey, umm, this is for helping me out!
Translation: Гей, е-е, це тобі за допомогу!

Source string: Kay. Bye.
Ah, the ol' rolling tunnel of crazy logs bit!
Translation: Ah, the ol' rolling tunnel of crazy logs bit!

Source string: An old one but a hard one!
Translation: An old one but a hard one!

Source string: What you gotta do is...
Heh heh
Ah, who we kiddin'?
You're never gonna make it through that!
Translation: You're never gonna make it through that!

Source string: AH-HA HA HA HA HA!
Mentalis Uber Alles!
Yyyyoink!
Ssssp!
Yyyyyyp!
Fffffp!
Rrrrrrrop!
So... this is it! The mental world...
Translation: То... ось який він! Ментальний світ...

Source string: It looks like a dentist office.
A mental dentist office!
It's a recruiting office, kids, and I'm here to recruit you for the greatest job in the world.
Translation: Це збірний пункт, діти, і я тут, щоб завербувати вас на найкращу роботу у світі.

Source string: Being a Psychonaut.
It's about fighting a war for mental freedom!
Translation: Наша мета — боротися за ментальну свободу!

Source string: Are you ready to face torture, insanity, and death?
Translation: Чи готові ви до тортур, безумства та смерті?

Source string: Cuz this is your last chance to chicken out!
Translation: Бо потім можливості дати задню не буде!

Source string: Ooh, me sir! I'd like to chicken out, please.
Translation: О, сер, а можна мені дати задню, будь ласка?

Source string: TOO LATE SOLDIER!
But you said--
There's only one way out of here: FIGHTING!
I want one of you chickens to sock me square in the jaw!
Translation: Я хочу, щоб хтось із вас, мальків, вмазав мені в щелепу!

Source string: But I warn you, once you do, the war is on.
Translation: Але попереджаю, після цього війни не уникнути.

Source string: I said pop me!
You're not gonna get another chance like this. I guarantee it.
Translation: Другого такого шансу не буде. Гарантую тобі.

Source string: You! Navy boy. Chicken of the sea. C'mon, let's go!
Translation: Ти! Матросе. Морська курко. Ну ж бо, спробуй!

Source string: You! Navy boy. Sea chicken. Let's go!
Translation: Ти! Матросе. Морська курко. Ну ж бо, спробуй!

Source string: How 'bout you, new kid?
Do it!
Let's go!
Right on the chin.
Ah! That's what I'm talking about!
Charrrrrrrrgggg--
HAHAHA.
What kind of obstacle course is this? That kid just got killed!
Translation: Що ж це за смуга перешкод така? На моїх очах убило дитину!

Source string: A MENTAL obstacle course, you bleeding heart!
He's not dead. His astral projection just got kicked out of my mind.
Translation: Він живий. Просто його астральну проєкцію викинуло з мого розуму.

Source string: And I'll kick your ass-tral projection outta here too, if you don't get moving right now!
Translation: А тобі я дам по срацьній проєкції, якщо не заворушишся!

Source string: You going to punch him?
No way! You do it!
OW!
Pick on someone your own size! Or bigger, like me.
Translation: Pick on someone your own size! Or bigger, like me.

Source string: Hey, Dogen. What's wrong?
Come on, Dogen! This way!
I keep blowing up.
I can't do it! I can't do it!
Translation: Я більше не можу! Я не можу!

Source string: Look! Raz! I didn't explode at all!
Good hustle out there.
Bye.
Yeahhhh. CLASSIC ZILCH!
Watch out! Fire down below!
Let... go... of... him.
Let go!
This is pathetic.
James, tell Chops to let go.
Translation: James, tell Chops to let go.

Source string: This is so immature.
I'm not gonna let JT down, Elka.
Translation: I'm not gonna let JT down, Elka.

Source string: Okay, Elka. Time to let go.
Translation: Okay, Elka. Time to let go.

Source string: Doom, you're offsides. Let go.
You let go!
Babe, I can hold out all day.
Translation: Babe, I can hold out all day.

Source string: Ow.
Okay, now let's just make sure we don't all let go at the same time.
Translation: Okay, now let's just make sure we don't all let go at the same time.

Source string: Say, there, I'm sure there's a compromise we can work out here
Translation: Say, there, I'm sure there's a compromise we can work out here

Source string: Come on partners. It's high noon. One of you's gotta draw.
Translation: Come on partners. It's high noon. One of you's gotta draw.

Source string: Dang. This sure is getting a might uncomfortable.
Translation: Dang. This sure is getting a might uncomfortable.

Source string: I think I've done grown a whole inch taller.
Translation: I think I've done grown a whole inch taller.

Source string: Yes!
Ow!
Ooof!
That help?
Beat it!
Grrr!
Come on. One nightmare.
Nope.
Pfffft. You hit like a boy.
Translation: Pfffft. You hit like a boy.

Source string: Hey, look! It's Raz!
Translation: Ви тільки гляньте! Це ж Раз!

Source string: Yay! Raz is here!
Yeah, maybe you'll be able to beat this darn game. We can't do it.
Translation: Ага, може в тебе вийде пройти цю кляту гру, бо в нас не виходить.

Source string: Yeah, we're no good, and the Coach won't open the gate until someone wins.
Translation: Та, в нас нема шансів, а тренер не відчинить ворота, поки хтось не переможе.

Source string: Just punch that to start!
Translation: Вмаж по цій кнопці, щоби почати!

Source string: Go Raz!
You score enough points on this course, kid, and I'll give you a reward!
Translation: Якщо набереш достатньо очок на цьому курсі, отримаєш нагороду, хлопче!

Source string: Yay, Raz!
Punch punch punch!
Punch punchie punch-punch!
Punch, Raz, punch!
Punnnnnnch! Hurray!
Oooh, don't punch the good guys!
Translation: О-ой, бий поганих, а не хороших!

Source string: Awwww...
Hey, it's okay.
I'm sure you'll get it, if you try again.
Translation: Певен, у тебе все вийде. Спробуй ще раз.

Source string: Yeah!
Try again!
Try again! Try again! Try again! Try again! Try again! Try again! Hahaha!
Translation: Спробуй ще! Спробуй ще! Спробуй ще! Спробуй ще! Спробуй ще! Ха-ха-ха!

Source string: Hey, not us! Silly!
Translation: Гей, та не нас же, дурнику!

Source string: Hahaha!
SHUT UP! SHUT UP! SHUT UP!
We'll never give up on you, Raz!
Yeah, we're going to keep cheering you 'til you win!
Translation: Так, ми будемо підбадьорювати тебе, поки не виграєш!

Source string: Yay!
Hey, good job, soldier.
Now here's your reward.
Heh heh.
Most people--they got something to hide.
They store away their shame, their dirty little secrets, in these tiny vaults in their minds.
Translation: Вони замикають свій сором, свої брудні секретики в ці маленькі сейфи спогадів.

Source string: But the enemy is not allowed any secrets in wartime, are they soldier?
Translation: Але ми ж не можемо дозволити ворогу мати секрети під час війни, так, солдате?

Source string: So go ahead and bust open this vault. I got nothin' to hide!
Translation: Тому йди та гепни по ньому. Мені нема чого ховати!

Source string: Ah, good. You enjoy that. One of my favorites!
Translation: Ось так. Насолоджуйся. Це один з моїх улюблених!

Source string: Hey, what are you staring at?
We all have emotional baggage, kid.
Translation: У всіх нас є емоційний багаж, хлопче.

Source string: Why don't you make yourself useful? Sort some of it out while you're in here?
Translation: Може відсортуєш його, раз уже тут? Хоч якась користь з тебе буде.

Source string: Keep your eyes peeled for a tag that matches. Could be anywhere.
Translation: Пильнуй і шукай відповідну бирку. Вона може бути де завгодно.

Source string: There it is! Now, you WILL pick up that tag and you WILL put it on that bag you just found.
Translation: Ось і вона! Тепер, НАКАЗУЮ взяти бирку та НАКАЗУЮ почепити її на сумку, яку ти щойно знайшов.

Source string: Unless you'd rather just drop and give me 20 right now!
Translation: А інакше падай на підлогу і роби двадцятку!

Source string: Good job. A mind should be clean and tight, like a soldiers bunk!
Translation: Good job. A mind should be clean and tight, like a soldiers bunk!

Source string: Sort out enough E.B. and you'll get something good, I promise.
Translation: Sort out enough E.B. and you'll get something good, I promise.

Source string: Hey, kid. I think I see a... silver dollar out there on that rail. Why don't you walk out there a bit and pick it up?
Translation: Hey, kid. I think I see a... silver dollar out there on that rail. Why don't you walk out there a bit and pick it up?

Source string: Ha! Sucker! See you at the bottom!
Translation: Ha! Sucker! See you at the bottom!

Source string: Run bunny!
Shoo!
Run! No wait, come back! Better you than me, bunny.
Translation: Run! No wait, come back! Better you than me, bunny.

Source string: AIGH!
The plane's going down soldier! Hit that door and Geronimo!!!
Translation: Літак падає, солдате! Вибивай ті двері й Джеронімо!!!

Source string: Hey, no one told me to pack a chute.
Translation: Гей, мене не попереджали, що знадобиться парашут.

Source string: Did Washington have a chute when he crossed the Delaware???
Translation: А хіба у Вашингтона був парашут, коли він перетинав Делавер???

Source string: Just jump, sissy!
What was that, Slowey?
Jump on that pole and move, soldier!
Translation: Jump on that pole and move, soldier!

Source string: Time to see how you shimmy, kid!
Translation: Time to see how you shimmy, kid!

Source string: Jump up to that ledge and let your fingers do the walkin'!
Translation: Jump up to that ledge and let your fingers do the walkin'!

Source string: You can swing on these too, but if you've got the balance, try walking on top of 'em.
Translation: You can swing on these too, but if you've got the balance, try walking on top of 'em.

Source string: Good for you monkey boy. Now swing high and try not to get shot!
Translation: Good for you monkey boy. Now swing high and try not to get shot!

Source string: They help you rank up, and when you rank up, you earn new psychic powers!
Translation: Вони допоможуть тобі підвищити ранг і отримати нові псиздібності!

Source string: Well, I guess we're all going to die.
My whole life is flashing before my eyes.
My first memory is of my dog, Lady.
Translation: Зокрема мій перший спогад про собаку Леді.

Source string: Lady and I used to go for long walks.
Translation: Ми з Леді нерідко ходили на довгі прогулянки.

Source string: They would go on and on and on and on.
This one time we went on a walk we called, "The Longest Walk of all Time." First we went to the end of our street.
Translation: Якось ми пішли на прогулянку, яку згодом назвали «Найдовшою прогулянкою всіх часів». Спочатку ми пішли в кінець вулиці.

Source string: And then we turned left.
And then we turned right.
And then we turned a soft right.
And then we turned a deep left.
And then we took a side road.
And then we stopped and asked for directions.
Translation: Потім ми зупинилися й спитали дорогу.

Source string: And then Lady had to go to the bathroom.
Translation: А потім Леді закортіло до туалету.

Source string: And then Lady saw a gopher.
And then Lady had to stop and scratch.
And then I bent down to tie my shoe.
Translation: А потім я нахилився, щоб зав'язати шнурки.

Source string: And then we walked three miles.
And then we walked two miles.
And then we walked four miles.
And then we walked half a mile.
And then we made a U-turn.
Translation: А потім ми розвернулися на 180 градусів.

Source string: And then we had a snack.
And then we got lost for a while.
And then we got attacked by bees.
Translation: А потім на нас напали бджоли.

Source string: And then I fell down a manhole and had to reset my own arm back in the socket.
Translation: А потім я впав у люк і мені довелося вправляти собі руку.

Source string: And then we just stood still for a while.
Translation: Потім ми зупинилися на деякий час.

Source string: And then I gave Lady a bone.
Translation: А потім я дав Леді кістку.

Source string: Is there, like, a climax to this story?
Translation: Є в цій історії якась кульмінація?

Source string: Didn't I mention the gopher yet?
Translation: Я тобі вже розповідав про ховрашка?

Source string: Thought I hit that. Okay, let me start over. First, we went to the end of our street.
Translation: Ти мене збив. Добре, почну спочатку. Пішли ми, власне, до кінця вулиці.

Source string: I think it's the door you want to hit. Not me.
Translation: Я думав тобі треба двері вибивати, а не мої зуби.

Source string: Hey, slow down, new kid.
If you pass me or Bobby you'll make us look bad, and Bobby will pound you deaf.
Translation: Якщо обгониш мене чи Боббі, ти виставиш нас у поганому світлі та Боббі тебе приб'є.

Source string: Right, Bobby?
Bobby?
BOBBY CAN YOU HEAR ME??? WHERE ARE YOU??
Translation: ТИ МЕНЕ ЧУЄШ, БОББІ??? ДЕ ТИ??

Source string: Don't leave me alone out here Bobby! I'm frightened! I'm frightened!
Translation: Не кидай мене тут самого, Боббі! Я наляканий! Мені страшно!

Source string: You've reached the brain of Coach Oleander.
Translation: You've reached the brain of Coach Oleander.

Source string: I'm currently occupied with matters in another part of my mind right now.
Translation: I'm currently occupied with matters in another part of my mind right now.

Source string: But for those students who'd like to run the course again for extra credit, or for a make-up exam, I'll leave it open.
Translation: But for those students who'd like to run the course again for extra credit, or for a make-up exam, I'll leave it open.

Source string: But I won't be here to watch over you, so please, children, be careful.
Translation: But I won't be here to watch over you, so please, children, be careful.

Source string: Your minds mean everything to us.
Translation: Your minds mean everything to us.

Source string: Press {XButton} to punch targets.

You've just absorbed positive MENTAL HEALTH! Maintaining your mental health is important, because if you run out, you will not be able to maintain your astral projection in this mind, and you'll be kicked back into the REAL WORLD.
Translation: Ви щойно поглинули позитивне МЕНТАЛЬНЕ ЗДОРОВ'Я! Слідкувати за рівнем ментального здоров'я важливо, бо якщо воно закінчиться, ви не зможете втримати вашу астральну проєкцію в розумі та вас викине в РЕАЛЬНИЙ СВІТ.

Source string: Yes, you can Dogen. Just follow me!
Translation: Усе ти можеш, Доґене. Просто йди за мною!

Source string: You will be penalized 1 point for missed targets and 2 points for friendly targets!
Translation: З вас буде знято 1 очко за пропущену ціль та 2 очки за збиття дружніх цілей!

Source string: You won't receive any points for hitting friendly targets!
Translation: Ви не отримуватимете очок за збиття дружніх цілей!

Source string: Sorry, time up!
Change direction with {YButton}
Dismount bar with {BButton}
Drop down to hang from tightrope with {BButton}
Translation: Drop down to hang from tightrope with {BButton}

Source string: Mount tightrope with {AButton}
Press {AButton} to jump.
Press {AButton} while airborne to double jump.
Translation: Натисніть {AButton} у повітрі для подвійного стрибка.

Source string: Shimmy on bar with left {Joystick}
Swing on bar with left {Joystick}
Translation: Гойдайтеся по трубі за допомогою лівого {Joystick}

Source string: Use LEFT {Joystick} to shimmy across ledge.
Use {Joystick} with {Abutton} to switch rails.
Translation: Відводьте {Joystick} і натискайте {Abutton}, щоб змінювати рейки.

Source string: Press {XButton} to punch Coach.
Jump and punch to activate button.
Translation: Jump and punch to activate button.

Source string: Target Course complete! Time :
seconds.
To SAVE your progress, press {StartButton} to open your JOURNAL, and on the first page, select SAVE.
Translation: Щоб ЗБЕРЕГТИ ваш прогрес, відкрийте журнал, натиснувши {StartButton}, і виберіть ЗБЕРЕГТИ на першій сторінці.

Source string: Jump on tightrope to mount.
Press {AButton} to bounce on tightrope.
Press {BButton} to hang by your hands.
Translation: Press {BButton} to hang by your hands.

Source string: Press {AButton} while hanging to pull up.
Translation: Press {AButton} while hanging to pull up.

Source string: Swing or shimmy with LEFT {Joystick}
Press {AButton} while swinging to dismount.
Click the RIGHT {Joystick} to enter first-person camera mode. Then move the RIGHT {Joystick} to look around.
Translation: Click the RIGHT {Joystick} to enter first-person camera mode. Then move the RIGHT {Joystick} to look around.

Source string: Use PSI BLAST to shut down the valve.
Translation: Use PSI BLAST to shut down the valve.

Source string: Follow me. I'll help you through the mines.
Translation: За мною. Я проведу тебе через мінне поле.
